data.actual_result: Link is left normal and first set of `**` is removed while second is left.
data.short_description: Links with `**` at either end (`**[link text](http://url.url)**`) remove the first set of `**` and dosnt make link bold
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a link in any channel with webhook or bot using the following format `**[text](url)**`
